items.header: Project Diablo 2 season 2 Transcendence Beta has begun!
Don't forget trading on any third party site or platform will result in a permanent ban make sure to get up to speed with our server rules to avoid having your account suspended or banned!
Check out our Trade Site at www.ProjectDiablo2.com/trade or the Trading Channels in our discord!
Project Diablo 2 season 1 Awakening has gone live
